description: Update the last used timestamp and increment use count for a saved search. Accepts id (ID!, must be positive integer). Returns Boolean (true if successful). Uses SavedSearchRepository.update_usage to update usage tracking. User isolation enforced - users can only update usage for their own saved searches. Automatically sets last_used_at to current UTC timestamp and increments use_count by 1. Raises NotFoundError if saved search doesn't exist or ForbiddenError if it doesn't belong to user. Silently fails for usage tracking (no toast shown).
